title: MOF-5 Fortified Fiber Optic Plasmonic Absorption-based Pb(II) Ion Sensor for Rapid Water Quality Monitoring
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00197D, Paper
Swetha Menon, Sourav Dutta, Narayanan Madaboosi, V. V. R. Sai
Precise detection of heavy metal ions in water is of paramount importance owing to its detrimental effects on human health, especially with spectroscopically silent ions such as lead ions (Pb(II))....
